Comments_List: I honed my speaking, reading, writing and listening skills of Japanese.
I love the textbook a lot. But perhaps there could be more grammatical guidance.

Strengths: the course is very well structured. Teachers are approachable and engaging.
Weakness: I wish we had more chance to explore the vocabulary we are interested. Now the topics in the class are predesigned, and if the readings aren't as interesting, homework starts to become a little bit dull.
Yes, I would. Japanese teachers are very very responsible, and you get a lot of individual attention from the small size of the class.
